00029 BdkPdf2DpolyDalitz::BdkPdf2DpolyDalitz(const char * theName, 
00030                                        const char * theDesc, 
00031                                        RooAbsReal & m12,

00041 
00043 void BdkPdf2DpolyDalitz::init(const char * theName, const char * theDesc,
00044                               RooAbsReal & m12, RooAbsReal & m13,
00045                               BdkDalitzBase::Flavor flavor,
00046                               RooRealVar* c[10])
00047 {
00048   
00049   // base class initialization:
00050   BdkPdfDalitzBase::init(theName, theDesc, m12, m13, flavor);
00051   
00052   // Use external coefficients or create them locally if not supplied
00053   for (int i=0;i<10;i++) {
00054     if (c && c[i]) _c[i] = c[i];
00055     else {
00056       TString num, name;
00057 
00058       // Build the names of the parameters: c0, s1...s5, a1...a4
00059       if (i==0) name = TString("c0");
00060       else if (i<=5) name = TString("s") + (num+=i);
00061       else name = TString("a") + (num+=(i-5));
00062 
00063       _c[i] = new RooRealVar(TString(GetName()) + TString(".") + name,
00064                              TString(GetTitle()) + name +" coefficient", 
00065                              0.1);
00066       _c[i]->setConstant(kFALSE);
00067       _c[i]->setError(0.05);
00068     }
00069   }                             
00070   
00071   setIsValid(kFALSE);
00072 }
00073 
00075 void BdkPdf2DpolyDalitz::createPdf() {
00076   Bdk2DpolyDalitz * thePdf = new Bdk2DpolyDalitz(TString(GetName())+".pdf",
00077                                                  TString(GetTitle())+" Pdf",
00078                                                  flavor(), 
00079                                                  BdkDalitzBase::PPP0,
00080                                                  *_m12, *_m13, *_c[0],
00081                                                  *_c[1], *_c[2], *_c[3],
00082                                                  *_c[4], *_c[5], *_c[6],
00083                                                  *_c[7], *_c[8], *_c[9],
00084                                                  true);
00085   
00086   setPdf(*thePdf);
00087   setIsValid(kTRUE);
00088 }
